sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A journey to London in the year 1698 after the ingenuous method of that made by Dr. Martin Lyster to Paris in the same year, &c. / written originally in French by Monsieur Sorbiere and newly translated into English. King, William, 1663-1712. Sorbière, Samuel, 1615-1670. Relation d'un voyage en Angleterre.
[8], 34, [2] p.
Printed and sold by A. Baldwin ..., London : 1698.
Fictiously attributed to Sorbière but written by William King. Cf. DNB. Satire on Lister's work: Journey to Paris in the year 1698. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

King, William, 1663-1712. Sorbière, Samuel, 1615-1670. Relation d'un voyage en Angleterre.
[8], 34, [2] p.
Printed and sold by A. Baldwin ..., London : 1698.
Fictiously attributed to Sorbière but written by William King. Cf. DNB. Satire on Lister's work: Journey to Paris in the year 1698. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A. Baldwin
